General.Name: BGF Retail Co Ltd
General.Description: BGF Co., Ltd. engages in the courier, advertising, data processing, and e-commerce businesses in South Korea. The company is also involved in retailing of agricultural and fishery products. In addition, it manufactures and sells eco-friendly and various plastic products. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
